## IContainer.attachPropertyData() method

Attach property metadata to the target object/class.

**Signature:**

```typescript
attachPropertyData(decoratorNameKey: string | symbol, data: any, target: Function | object, propertyName: string | symbol): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

decoratorNameKey


</td><td>

string \| symbol


</td><td>

The key to identify the decorator metadata


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

data


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

The metadata to be attached


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

target


</td><td>

Function \| object


</td><td>

The target object or class constructor


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

propertyName


</td><td>

string \| symbol


</td><td>

The name of the property to attach metadata to


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
container.attachPropertyData('key', 'value', UserService, 'property');
```
